goal.tools.mc.evaluator

Interface Evaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GOALEvaluator

    public interface Evaluator
    Represents the evaluator component of a model checker.
    Author:
    sungshik

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean entails(State q, Formula formula)
      Determines whether the specified state entails the specified formula.
      boolean entailsAll(State q, LMHashSet<Formula> formulas)
      Determines whether all formulas in the specified set are entailed by the specified state.
      int getDistinctEvaluated()
      Gets the number of distinct states that have been evaluated during the model checking run up to the point of invocation.

    • Method Detail

      • entails

        boolean entails(State q,
              Formula formula)
        Determines whether the specified state entails the specified formula.
        Parameters:
        q - - The state to evaluate the formula in.
        formula - - The formula to check entailment for.
        Returns:
        true if q entails formula; false otherwise.

      • entailsAll

        boolean entailsAll(State q,
                 LMHashSet<Formula> formulas)
        Determines whether all formulas in the specified set are entailed by the specified state.
        Parameters:
        q - - The state to evaluate the formulas in.
        formulas - - The formulas to check entailment for.
        Returns:
        true if q entails all formulas in the set; false otherwise.

      • getDistinctEvaluated

        int getDistinctEvaluated()
        Gets the number of distinct states that have been evaluated during the model checking run up to the point of invocation.
        Returns:
        The number of distinct states.
